rankings.title: Virtual Snow Days and the Weather-Absence Penalty for Working Parents
conditions: explicit validation of implementation/take-up where possible
careful timing alignment using CPS reference week + local snowfall
inference robust to small treated-cluster counts in the pre-COVID sample

conditions: pre-registering an event-study that tests pre-trends
exploring heterogeneity by irrigated share/crop mix
